name: Cargo Crusaders
description:
Welcome to Cargo Crusaders, the ultimate retro trucking adventure game! Get behind the wheel of your trusty semi-truck and hit the open road to become the most successful trucker in the business. Deliver cargo across a variety of landscapes. Download today!

Further down the road we plan on adding the whole world into this game! Currently though, you can only access a few States across the U.S.

[[INSTALL GUIDE]]

(P.S: Feel free to support us!)

{WINDOWS}

    1. Download the game files.

    2. Unzip the file.

    3. Create a shortcut.

    4. Play!

{MAC OS}

    1. Download the game files.

    2. Unzip the file.

    3. Locate the "rpginabox" file and create a shortcut.

    4. Play!

(GAME IS IN FREE EARLY ACCESS, PAID FULL ACCESS COMING SOON!)
